responses: Hey there!
Hello, thanks for visiting WPR Store
Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting WPR Store
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
We are open from 9 AM to 9 PM every day.
You can return any item within 30 days of purchase. Please ensure the item is in its original condition.
We offer free shipping on orders over $50. Standard shipping is $5, and express shipping is $15.

patterns: What is the status of my order?
responses: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email. If you need further assistance, please provide your order number.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal.

patterns: Do you have this item available?
responses: Please provide the product name or SKU, and I will check the availability for you.

patterns: I need help with my order
Can I speak to a representative?
responses: You can contact our support team at support@wprstore.com or call us at 1-800-123-4567.

patterns: What is the best product for me?
I'm looking for a good product.
responses: Sure, please provide some details on what you're looking for, and I'll recommend the best products for you.
We have a 20% discount on all electronics. Check our 'Deals' section for more offers.

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
How does your loyalty program work?
responses: Yes, we have a loyalty program. You earn points with every purchase that can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

patterns: How do I get a refund?
Can I get my money back?
responses: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. You will be notified via email once the refund is processed.

patterns: How do I track my order?
Can I see where my order is?
responses: You can track your order by logging into your account and going to 'My Orders'.

patterns: How do I cancel my order?
responses: To cancel your order, please contact our support team as soon as possible. If the order hasn't been shipped, we can process the cancellation.
Yes, you can exchange items within 30 days of purchase. Please contact our support team to initiate the exchange.

We apologize for the delay. Sometimes, due to high demand or logistical issues, orders might take longer to deliver. Please check your email for any updates or contact our support team for more information.

patterns: How do I create an account?
responses: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right corner of the homepage and fill in your details.

patterns: How do I reset my password?
responses: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions.
